entities.name: kratcher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who is being addressed by Fred. He is described as 'poor old' and is muttering to himself.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is the one addressing Kreacher. He says hello to Kreacher very loudly.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George asks Fred if he caught what Kreacher said, indicating that George was not paying attention.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is present and seems to be amused by the situation with Kreacher.

entities.name: mudblood
entities.description: Mudblood is a term used by Kreacher to refer to Harry. It is described as 'unnatural'.

relationships.description: Fred addresses Kreacher, saying hello very loudly.
George asks Fred if he caught what Kreacher said, indicating that George was listening to Kreacher.
Kreacher refers to Harry as a 'Mudblood', indicating that Harry is being referred to by this term.
